description: Bella Farm is an innovative initiative in Kenya focused on beekeeping and the production of natural honey and its byproducts. Motivated by the prevalence of adulterated honey in the market, the project aims to provide pure, healthy alternatives while educating the community about the benefits of bees. Bella Farm also specializes in apitherapy, utilizing bee venom for therapeutic purposes, and collaborates with government and medical facilities to promote awareness and training in sustainable beekeeping practices.
name: Bella Farm
